TenantSecurityPolicyDeployment.name: TenantSecurityPolicyDeployment
TenantSecurityPolicyDeployment.description: Stores the status of deployments of a Security Center policy on a tenant. For more information, see Define and Deploy Security Policies. This object is available to Security Center subscribers in API version 54.0 and later.

DeploymentDate.description: The date the deployment was triggered.

DeploymentStatus.description: The status of the deployment. For example, Not Deployed, Processing, Deployed, or Failed.

Description.description: The description of the deployment status.

PolicyIdentifier.description: The ID of the TenantSecurityPolicy entity.

StatusDate.description: The date that the status of the deployment was provided.

Tenant.description: The ID of the tenant for which the policy was deployed.
